devdoc.author: Everson B. Silva
devdoc.details: DeveloperPool is a contract to reward developers

addDeveloper(address).details: Add a new develop to the pool

addLevel(address).details: Increment the level of the develop

allowance().details: Show how much tokens the developer can withdraw from DeveloperPool address TODO Check external code call - EXTCALL

approve().details: Allow the developer to approve tokens from DeveloperPool address. DeveloperPool address must have tokens in SAC TOKEN TODO Check external code call - EXTCALL

getDevelopersAddress().details: Return the developers address of the system

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

undoLevel(address).details: Set to zero the level of the develop

withDraw().details: Allow the dev withdraw tokens from DeveloperPool address to his address TODO Check external code call - EXTCALL
